name: Musify
brief: Developed a Spotify discography search website using React, Bootstrap,  NodeJS, and SpotifyAPI

name: Animation Editor
brief: Developed an animation editor with a partner to using MVC framework in Java

name: Covid Data Analytics
brief: With a group of 3 other students, I cleaned and performed EDA on this dataset with the end goal of predicting the total number of deaths per million

name: Organizational Behavior Analysis
brief: Conducted an organizational analysis of a local Boston-based business with a team of 4 other students

name: Analysis of Naver's Acquisition of Poshmark
brief: Group project: conducted an in-depth analysis of Naver, Poshmark, and their competitors to understand why Naver acquired Poshmark and analyze the success of the acquisition

name: MassPass Covid Testing App Design
brief: Worked with a team to create a high-fidelity UI of a Covid testing application for Massachusetts residents

name: Personal Website
brief: Created a personal portfolio website using React and Bootstrap

name: International Marketing Research Project
brief: While studying in Yonsei University in South Korea, worked with a team to study Spotify's international marketing strategy
